experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributing to M&T Bank's digital transformation by building enterprise-scale web components and design systems. Developing reusable UI components that reduce development time by 40% across multiple teams, ensuring consistent user experience across 200+ internal applications. Implementing accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA) to ensure compliance for 8 million+ customer interactions. Optimizing component performance resulting in 25% faster page load times and improved developer productivity through comprehensive Storybook documentation and automated testing with Jest.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Delivered critical healthcare data infrastructure supporting the CMS EOM & GUIDE models. Built and optimized FHIR-compliant microservices processing 50K+ patient records, improving data interoperability by 75% and reducing processing time from hours to minutes. Implemented AWS cloud solutions (Lambda, S3, EKS) that achieved 99.9%. Enhanced system reliability and security for sensitive healthcare data, ensuring HIPAA compliance and enabling real-time analytics that improved patient care outcomes for beneficiaries.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Drove significant improvements to MatrixCare's SNF EHR platform serving 10,000+ healthcare facilities nationwide. Delivered Medication Reconciliation feature that increased patient re-admission efficiency by 50%, reducing manual processing time from 45 minutes to 20 minutes per patient. Enhanced Labsoft integration with new HL7 fields, improving lab data accuracy and reducing data entry errors. Led Gainsight implementation tracking 100K+ monthly user interactions, resulting in 35% improvement in user engagement and 25% reduction in support tickets. Pioneered micro-frontend POC that enabled independent team development. Mentored 2 interns on Okta authorization system, delivering production-ready AWS Lambda solution. Developed 30+ Crystal Reports providing critical patient insights to providers, supporting $500M+ in annual revenue decisions. Optimized SQL procedures reducing query execution time by 70%, improving system performance for 50,000+ daily users.
